messages.TRMSG_PRE_DOUBLE_BATTLE_1:
Matt: Uhohoho! I’ll show y’all how
tightly I’ve bonded with my daughter!
messages.TRMSG_DOUBLE_BATTLE_DEFEAT_1:
Matt: Parent-and-child power couldn’t
get the job done.
messages.TRMSG_POST_DOUBLE_BATTLE_1:
Matt: I reckon the bonds between you
and your Pokémon are like the bonds parents share with their kids.
messages.TRMSG_DOUBLE_BATTLE_NOT_ENOUGH_POKEMON_1:
Matt: Oh, there’s no way you could
beat us both with one Pokémon.
messages.TRMSG_DOUBLE_BATTLE_REMATCH_1:
Matt: Ayuh? You’re here to check the
bond I have with my daughter again?
messages.TRMSG_PRE_DOUBLE_BATTLE_2:
Ava: I can get away with slacking
off if I have my Pokémon out!
messages.TRMSG_POST_DOUBLE_BATTLE_2:
Ava: Papa, I’m so sorry!
I’ll work harder from tomorrow on!...Yup, tomorrow’s when I’m going to
start working.
messages.TRMSG_DOUBLE_BATTLE_NOT_ENOUGH_POKEMON_2:
Ava: You’re battling me and my pa.
One Pokémon won’t cut it, dear!
messages.TRMSG_DOUBLE_BATTLE_REMATCH_2:
Ava: Oh, hi! It’s good y’all came
calling on us again!I can take a break from work if I’m
battling Pokémon. Lucky for me!
